### Janitorial Services – RCMP Headingley Rural Detachment, MB

**Tender Reference Number:** cb-7115-67432435
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** M5000-20-4142/A

**Tender Due Date:** Tuesday, August 16, 2023, 16:00:00

### Background
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a contractor to provide janitorial services to the RCMP Headingley Rural Detachment, located in Manitoba. The contract will commence on the contract start date, with an expected contract duration of two years, with optional extensions of up to three additional one-year periods.

The scope of work includes:

* Labour, materials, equipment, transportation, and daily site supervision for janitorial services
* Cleaning to be performed three times a week

The contract will require compliance with security requirements and follow the procedures outlined in the solicitation.

### Tender Evaluation Criteria
The tender will be evaluated based on the following:

* Compliance with the requirements of the solicitation
* Lowest evaluated price

### Tender Information
Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit in accordance with the instructions provided on the first page of the Invitation to Tender (I.T.T.).

### Important Notes

* A site visit is offered; please refer to the Invitation to Tender for additional details.
* Indigenous Procurement: It is recommended that bidders familiarize themselves with the federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD), which may increase their company’s visibility and provide additional business opportunities.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

Please note that Canada reserves the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement, and it is the bidder’s responsibility to regularly consult the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) for the most up-to-date information.

### Contact Information

13065151653
